title: What services do you provide?
content: We handle end-to-end event planning and execution including concept creation, venue booking, décor, stage setup, audiovisuals, catering, entertainment, manpower, logistics, branding, gifting and on-site management.

title: What types of events do you manage?
content: We manage corporate events, product launches, conferences, exhibitions, weddings, private parties, concerts, festivals, and social gatherings.

title: Can you customize events according to our requirements?
content: Yes, every event is customized as per the client’s theme, budget, and objectives.

title: How early should we contact you before the event?
content: Ideally, at least 1-2 weeks in advance. However, we also handle last-minute events depending on availability.

title: Do you work with specific vendors or can we bring our own?
content: We have trusted vendors for every service, but we are open to collaborating with your preferred vendors too.

title: Do you provide manpower for events?
content: Yes, we provide professional manpower such as hosts, hostesses, ushers, promotor, volunteer, models, technical crew, and support staff.

title: How do you handle budgets?
content: We work within the budget provided by the client and offer cost-effective solutions without compromising on quality.

title: Can you manage outstation or international events?
content: Yes, we organize events across India and abroad, depending on the requirement.

title: What happens if there is an emergency or last-minute change?
content: Our team always has backup plans and resources to ensure smooth execution even in case of unexpected issues.

title: How much do you charge for event management?
content: Charges vary depending on the type, size, and scale of the event. We provide customized quotes after understanding your requirements.

title: Do you take care of event permissions and licenses?
content: Yes, we assist in obtaining necessary permissions for sound, venue, liquor, or government approvals (if required).

title: Can you also arrange entertainment and celebrity appearances?
content: Yes, we arrange artists, musicians, DJs, celebrities, motivational speakers, and performers as per client needs.

title: Do you provide décor and theme design?
content: Yes, we specialize in creative décor, theme-based setups, floral arrangements, stage design, and branding elements.

title: How do I book your services?
content: You can reach us via phone, email, or our website. Once we understand your requirements, we’ll share you a quick proposal & quote.
